document.full_text: jennifer lopez's new entry "on the floor" knocked adele off the top of the u.k. singles chart on sunday but the young british soul singer is still dominating -- and breaking records with -- album sales.
document.title: j-lo tops u.k. singles, adele retains album crown
lines_and_colors: jennifer lopez's new entry "on the floor" knocked adele off the top of the u.k. singles chart on sunday but the young british soul singer is still dominating -- and breaking records with -- album sales.
